cards.name: Guard
cards.help: Name a non-Guard card and choose another player. If that player has that card, they are out of the round.

cards.name: Baron
cards.help: You and another player secretly compare hands. The player with the lower rank is out of the round.

cards.name: Handmaid
cards.help: Card abilities do not affect you until your next turn

cards.name: Prince
cards.help: Choose any player (including yourself) to discard their hand and draw a new card.

cards.name: King
cards.help: Trade hands with another player of your choice.

cards.name: Countess
cards.help: If you have this card and the King or Prince in your hand, you must discard this card.

cards.name: Princess
cards.help: If you discard this card, you are out of the round.
